title: 5 Reasons to Buy a $188 Laptop
description: For less than $200 the HP Stream 14 is a surprisingly decent budget laptop on the cheap. HP Stream on Amazon:  Ultra Gaming on a $200 Laptop:   Subscribe!  Instagram:  Twitter:  Facebook:
